segments.text: Good afternoon , everyone . The experiment is to start at 3 . Have you gone through the instructions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , now some points for attention . First of all , pay attention to safety ... Now , sign your names on the lab record , and after that you can start . If there is any question , just let me know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excuse me , sir . This air compressor doesn't work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , I will get you another one .
segments.speaker: S1
